description: Try our easy to follow Fillet of Beef in Red Wine Marinade recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Fillet of Beef in Red Wine Marinade
name: Fillet of Beef in Red Wine Marinade Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.7 kg piece scotch fillet or fillet of beef

recipeInstructions.text: Strain marinade and discard onion and garlic. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat. When melted add flour, stirring constantly, until bubbly. Cook for 1 minute. Remove pan from heat and slowly add marinade, stirring constantly. Return to heat and stir until mixture comes to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 12 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Serve slices of beef with red wine sauce.
